item.title: [kdr] Foundry Inspector
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [kdr] Foundry Hornet
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Flying

When Foundry Hornet enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Fortuitous Find
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one or both —

• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [kdr] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [kdr] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [kdr] Fireforger's Puzzleknot
item.description:
Artifact

When Fireforger's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

{2}{R}, Sacrifice Fireforger's Puzzleknot: It deals 1 damage to any target.

item.title: [kdr] Filigree Familiar
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Fox

When Filigree Familiar enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

When Filigree Familiar dies, draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Fen Hauler
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Fen Hauler can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

item.title: [kdr] Fateful Showdown
item.description:
Instant

Fateful Showdown deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand. Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

item.title: [kdr] Fatal Push
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less.

Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [kdr] Fatal Push
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less.

Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [kdr] Fairgrounds Warden
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Soldier

When Fairgrounds Warden enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Fairgrounds Warden leaves the battlefield.

item.title: [kdr] Fabrication Module
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you get one or more {E} (energy counters), put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

{4}, {T}: You get {E}.

item.title: [kdr] Essence Extraction
item.description:
Instant

Essence Extraction deals 3 damage to target creature and you gain 3 life.

item.title: [kdr] Era of Innovation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever an artifact or Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}, Sacrifice Era of Innovation: Draw three cards.

item.title: [kdr] Enraged Giant
item.description:
Creature — Giant

Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Trample, haste

item.title: [kdr] Engineered Might
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

• Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Empyreal Voyager
item.description:
Creature — Vedalken Scout

Flying, trample

Whenever Empyreal Voyager deals combat damage to a player, you get that many {E} (energy counters).

item.title: [kdr] Embraal Bruiser
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Embraal Bruiser enters the battlefield tapped.

Embraal Bruiser has menace as long as you control an artifact.

item.title: [kdr] Electrostatic Pummeler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

When Electrostatic Pummeler enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).

Pay {E}{E}{E}: Electrostatic Pummeler gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

item.title: [kdr] Eddytrail Hawk
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Eddytrail Hawk enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

Whenever Eddytrail Hawk attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Eager Construct
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [kdr] Dynavolt Tower
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Dynavolt Tower deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [kdr] Dukhara Peafowl
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Bird

{U}: Dukhara Peafowl gains flying until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Druid of the Cowl
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [kdr] Dovin Baan
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Dovin

+1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gets -3/-0 and its activated abilities can't be activated.

−1: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

−7: You get an emblem with "Your opponents can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps."

item.title: [kdr] Disallow
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

item.title: [kdr] Die Young
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.

item.title: [kdr] Destructive Tampering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

item.title: [kdr] Depala, Pilot Exemplar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Pilot

Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1.

Each Vehicle you control gets +1/+1 as long as it's a creature.

Whenever Depala, Pilot Exemplar becomes tapped, you may pay {X}. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your library, put all Dwarf and Vehicle cards from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [kdr] Demon of Dark Schemes
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

When Demon of Dark Schemes enters the battlefield, all other creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

Whenever another creature dies, you get {E} (an energy counter).

{2}{B}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped.

item.title: [kdr] Demolition Stomper
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Demolition Stomper can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Crew 5 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [kdr] Defiant Salvager
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Artificer

Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.title: [kdr] Decoction Module
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter).

{4}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.title: [kdr] Dawnfeather Eagle
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Dawnfeather Eagle enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Dark Intimations
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, then discards a card. You return a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand, then draw a card.

When you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, exile Dark Intimations from your graveyard. That planeswalker enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on it.

item.title: [kdr] Daring Demolition
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature or Vehicle.

item.title: [kdr] Daredevil Dragster
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

At end of combat, if Daredevil Dragster attacked or blocked this combat, put a velocity counter on it. Then if it has two or more velocity counters on it, sacrifice it and draw two cards.

Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [kdr] Cultivator's Caravan
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [kdr] Creeping Mold
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

item.title: [kdr] Countless Gears Renegade
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Artificer

Revolt — When Countless Gears Renegade enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

item.title: [kdr] Conviction
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

item.title: [kdr] Contraband Kingpin
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Rogue

Lifelink

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.

item.title: [kdr] Consulate Turret
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: You get {E} (an energy counter).

{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Consulate Turret deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [kdr] Consulate Skygate
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Wall

Defender

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [kdr] Confiscation Coup
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose target artifact or creature. You get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters), then you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that permanent's converted mana cost. If you do, gain control of it.

item.title: [kdr] Concealed Courtyard
item.description:
Land

Concealed Courtyard enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

item.title: [kdr] Commencement of Festivities
item.description:
Instant

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

item.title: [kdr] Combustible Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

First strike

When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards.
